author: Tony Abou-Ganim
description: Be sure to use a ripe or even over-ripe banana in this tropical style drink.
name: Funky Monkey
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
22.5 ml White crème de cacao liqueur
30 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice and serve with straws
